verses.name: Leviticus 13:43
verses.text: Then the priest shall look upon it: and, behold, if the rising of the sore be white reddish in his bald head, or in his bald forehead, as the leprosy appeareth in the skin of the flesh;

verses.name: Leviticus 13:44
verses.text: He is a leprous man, he is unclean: the priest shall pronounce him utterly unclean; his plague is in his head.

verses.name: Leviticus 13:45
verses.text: And the leper in whom the plague is, his clothes shall be rent, and his head bare, and he shall put a covering upon his upper lip, and shall cry, Unclean, unclean.
